intelligence_platform_summary.api_endpoints: 30+ REST endpoints for complete intelligence operations

Phase_6A.name: Regulatory & Compliance Analysis
key_features: Multi-framework compliance analysis (GDPR, HIPAA, PCI, SOX)
Automated document parsing and rule extraction

Phase_6C.name: Intelligent Policy Recommendations
key_features: Pattern overlap analysis with similarity scoring
Coverage gap identification and smart suggestions

Phase_6D.name: Predictive Policy Intelligence
key_features: Threat pattern forecasting with ML models
Zero-day pattern generation via genetic/neural algorithms

Phase_7.name: Reinforcement Learning Framework
key_features: Contextual multi-armed bandits for policy optimization
Shadow mode safety for risk-free deployment
A/B testing framework for policy experiments

ml_integration.scikit_learn_powered: Random Forest, Bayesian Ridge, TF-IDF, Isolation Forest

architecture_excellence.modular_design: Independent phase modules with clean interfaces
